document_data.name: Knights of the Forked Tongue
document_data.mainbody: The '''Knights of the Forked Tongue''' was an elite military order in service of the [[Cathedral of Emerald Scales]] in [[Hlondeth]], the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Organization: The Knights of the Forked Tongue were [[crusader]]s who guarded the Cathedral of Emerald Scales and its clergy. The members of the order dedicated their lives to the serpentine deity [[Varae]], an aspect of [[Sseth]].
